alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 11:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Coffee, northwestern Pierce, east central Atkinson, northwestern Ware, Bacon, southeastern Jeff Davis and southwestern Appling Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1154 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong a cluster of thunderstorm nears Nicholls, or east of Douglas, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Alma, Graham, Nicholls, West Green, Denton, New Lacy and Bickley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce
